comment: This is generated by ESQL's AbstractFunctionTestCase. Do no edit it. See ../README.md for how to regenerate it.
name: cidr_match
description: Returns true if the provided IP is contained in one of the provided CIDR blocks.

params.name: ip
params.description: IP address of type `ip` (both IPv4 and IPv6 are supported).

params.name: blockX
params.description: CIDR block to test the IP against.

params.name: ip
params.description: IP address of type `ip` (both IPv4 and IPv6 are supported).

params.name: blockX
params.description: CIDR block to test the IP against.

examples:
FROM hosts 
| WHERE CIDR_MATCH(ip1, "127.0.0.2/32", "127.0.0.3/32") 
| KEEP card, host, ip0, ip1
